## Types of Changes

- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Bug fix (issue #<strong></strong>)

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows the code style of the project.
- [ ] Tests have been added to cover the changes.
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass.
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
